scripts.build: npm run build:ts && cp -r lambdas/log-exporter/node_modules dist/lambdas/log-exporter/node_modules && cp -r lambdas/image-proxy/node_modules dist/lambdas/image-proxy/node_modules &&   cp -r lambdas/edge-signer/node_modules dist/lambdas/edge-signer/node_modules
scripts.postinstall: cd lambdas/image-proxy && npm i && cd .. && cd log-exporter && npm i && cd .. && cd edge-signer && npm i && cd ../..
